forum.content:
法國電音新浪潮電音團daftpunk與
the stroke主唱的合作

以下翻譯

自網路

Instant Crush

By Daft Punk ft. Julian Casablanca


[Verse 1]

I didn't want to be the one to forget

我不想消失在妳的記憶之中

I thought of everything I'd never regret

我想起那些我不會後悔的事

A little time with you is all that I get

跟妳在一起的瞬間卻是我所奢求的

That’s all we need because it's all we can take

我們需要的只是我們僅有的

One thing I never see the same way around

我從來沒試著用這種眼光看待這件事

I don’t believe it and it slips on the ground

我不相信這種事並讓它流逝

I wanna take you to that place in the “Roche”

我想帶妳去"Roche"(地名？)

But no one gives us any time anymore

但這世界卻嗇於施捨我們一點時間

You used me once, you fled, looking, it was dark

「你」利用著我 破壞了你的誓言 看著  那是多麼的黑暗

You made an offer for it, then you ran off

「妳」對我說著妳的夢想，但我們卻分開了

I got this picture of us kids in my head

我記得我們的照片 以及那些頑皮的孩子們

And all I hear is the last thing that you said

我所聽到的都是你/妳最後所說得


[Pre Chorus]

"I listened to your problems

Now listen to mine"

我聆聽著你們的困擾 但我卻無法說出我的

I didn't want to anymore, oh oh oh

我不想要這一切再繼續了 喔 喔 喔


[Chorus]

And we will never be alone again

我們不會再孤獨了

'Cause it doesn't happen every day

因為這種機會是不可奢望的

Kinda counted on you being a friend

期待著至少當個朋友

Can I give it up or give it away

我可以把這種關係毀掉嗎

Now I thought about what I wanna say

我正想著那些我想對妳說的話

But I never really know where to go

但我不知道從何說起

So I chained myself to a friend

所以我又把自己鎖在朋友區(friend zone)

'Cause I know it unlocks like a door

因為我知道這種鎖住的關係隨時都可以解開

And we will never be alone again

我們不會再孤獨了

'Cause it doesn't happen every day

因為這種機會是不可奢望的

Kinda counted on you being a friend

期待著至少當個朋友

Can I give it up or give it away

我可以把這種關係毀掉嗎

Now I thought about what I wanna say

我正想著那些我想對妳說的話

But I never really know where to go

但我不知道從何說起

So I chained myself to a friend

所以我又把自己鎖在朋友區(friend zone)


Some more again

再多講些吧


[Verse 2]

It didn't matter what they wanted to see

別人的眼光並不重要。

He thought he saw someone that looked just like me

他以為看到了我的轉世

The summer memory that just never dies

那美好的記憶我不會忘掉

We worked too long and hard to give it no time

我們努力想出這些 最後卻沒時間落實

He sees right through me, it's so easy with lies

他看透我了 單單靠著他的謊言

Cracks in the road that I would try and disguise

我受傷了 我試著縫合我的傷口

He runs the scissors at the seam in the wall

他卻拿著剪刀剪開我的縫線

He cannot break it down or else he would fall

他不能毀掉我否則他也將隕落

One thousand lonely stars hiding in the cold

那天上千百顆星星 躲在冷酷背後

Take it, I don't wanna sing anymore

拿走那些意識 我已經不想再唱了

[Pre Chorus]

"I listened to your problems

Now listen to mine"

我聆聽著你們的困擾 但我卻無法說出我的

I didn't want to anymore, oh oh oh

我不想要這一切再繼續了 喔 喔 喔


[Chorus]

And we will never be alone again

我們不會再孤獨了

'Cause it doesn't happen every day

因為這種機會是不可奢望的

Kinda counted on you being a friend

期待著至少當個朋友

Can I give it up or give it away

我可以把這種關係毀掉嗎

Now I thought about what I wanna say

我正想著那些我想對妳說的話

But I never really know where to go

但我不知道從何說起

So I chained myself to a friend

所以我又把自己鎖在朋友區(friend zone)

'Cause I know it unlocks like a door

因為我知道這種鎖住的關係隨時都可以解開


And we will never be

urls.description: Daft Punk's official music video for 'Instant Crush' ft. Julian Casablancas. Click to listen to Daft
urls.title: Daft Punk - Instant Crush ft. Julian Casablancas

forum.title: 傻瓜龐克daftpunk---instant crush
